On.Terms: AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom ##unitName##Flying; MorphTo ##unitName##; ScopeContains FlyerHelperSplat; HasStatus FlyerHelper

On.Send: AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
AnimBracketStart FlyAway Stand,Unpowered,End Stand,Unpowered Stand,Unpowered,Start ClosingFull
AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
AnimBracketStart Visor Morph,Start Morph,Stand Morph,End Instant
AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death ContentPlayOnce
AnimBracketStart Phasing Work,Start Work Work,End Instant
AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever
AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
AnimBracketStart Morph IGNORE Burrow Stand,Burrow ContentPlayOnce
AnimBracketStart Morph IGNORE Burrow Stand,Burrow ContentPlayOnce
AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
